I have not been able to reproduce - do you have a consistent case?

Appears to be a problem in PageBookView$SelectionProvider.getSelection().
getPageSite(getCurrentPage()) is returning null.

Case I have been using to reproduce:
I run a simple program (so the source is open)
Step into System.out.println (to get an empty class file editor)
Have the variables view activated.
Problem occurs during the initialization of the editor plugin action delegates.

This has already been fixed

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7117 ***
